issue.title: [CF 244] Not Locking for me
issue.body:
I installed the new version and I am now having issues with my original set ups.  I disabled all my other mods in case that was the problem, but it didn't help.  So, I type /tmw and it doesn't toggle the group.  I can only see the group after I disable it then enable it, but then it is stuck in configuration mode.  Any ideas?

Edit:  Attached LUA file.  Version 4.4.2


> Posted by CurseForge user Fjurry99 | Imported from CurseForge issue #244 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua

<p>TellMeWhen.lua</p>


> Posted by CurseForge user Fjurry99

1) "the new version" is not a version.
2) Please attach your saved variables to help me diagnose the problem. Saved variables are found in World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<ACCOUNTNAME>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Rockin'! Whatever it was, it's fixed now! Thank you so so so much!


> Posted by CurseForge user Fjurry99
